net.spy.memcached
Class ConnectionFactoryBuilder

java.lang.Object
  net.spy.memcached.ConnectionFactoryBuilder

public class ConnectionFactoryBuilder
extends java.lang.Object

Builder for more easily configuring a ConnectionFactory.
